00024  int SearchResultsModel::rowCount(const QModelIndex &/*parent*/) const
00025  {

00027         return m_results->num_results();
00028     else

00037  QVariant SearchResultsModel::data(const QModelIndex &index, int role) const
00038  {
00039     if (!m_results)
00040         return QVariant();
00041 
00042     if (!index.isValid())
00043         return QVariant();
00044 
00045     if (index.row() >= m_results->num_results())
00046         return QVariant();
00047 
00048     if (role == Qt::DisplayRole)
00049     {
00050         int column = index.column();
00051         if (column == translation_column)
00052         {
00053             boost::shared_ptr<const Translation> translation = m_translation_manager->at(m_results->translation_at(index.row()));
00054             return translation->get_short_name().c_str();
00055         }
00056         else if (column == book_column)
00057         {
00058             boost::shared_ptr<const Translation> translation = m_translation_manager->at(m_results->translation_at(index.row()));
00059             return translation->get_verse(m_results->at(index.row()))->get_book().c_str();;
00060         }
00061         else if (column == chapter_column)
00062         {
00063             boost::shared_ptr<const Translation> translation = m_translation_manager->at(m_results->translation_at(index.row()));
00064             return translation->get_verse(m_results->at(index.row()))->get_chapter();
00065         }
00066         else if (column == verse_column)
00067         {
00068             boost::shared_ptr<const Translation> translation = m_translation_manager->at(m_results->translation_at(index.row()));
00069             return translation->get_verse(m_results->at(index.row()))->get_verse();
00070         }
00071         else if (column == text_column)
00072         {
00073             boost::shared_ptr<const Translation> translation = m_translation_manager->at(m_results->translation_at(index.row()));
00074             return translation->get_verse(m_results->at(index.row()))->get_text().c_str();
00075         }
00076         else
00077         {
00078             return QVariant();
00079         }
00080     }
00081     else if (role == Qt::ToolTipRole)
00082     {
00083         int column = index.column();
00084         if (column == translation_column)
00085         {
00086             boost::shared_ptr<const Translation> translation = m_translation_manager->at(m_results->translation_at(index.row()));
00087             return translation->get_long_name().c_str();
00088         }
00089         else if (column == text_column)
00090         {
00091             boost::shared_ptr<const Translation> translation = m_translation_manager->at(m_results->translation_at(index.row()));
00092             translation = m_translation_manager->at(m_results->translation_at(index.row()));
00093             return verse_collection_to_title_and_string_wrapped(translation->get_verse(m_results->at(index.row()), 0), translation).c_str();
00094         }
00095         else
00096         {
00097             return QVariant();
00098         }
00099     }
00100     else
00101     {
00102         return QVariant();
00103     }
00104  }

00106  QVariant SearchResultsModel::headerData(int section, Qt::Orientation orientation,
00107                                          int role) const
00108  {
00109     if (role == Qt::DisplayRole)
00110     {
00111         if (orientation == Qt::Horizontal)
00112             switch (section)
00113             {
00114                 case translation_column:
00115                     return tr("T");
00116                 
00117                 case book_column:
00118                     return tr("Book");
00119                 
00120                 case chapter_column:
00121                     return tr("Ch");
00122 
00123                 case verse_column:
00124                     return tr("V");
00125 
00126                 case text_column:
00127                     return tr("Verse Text");
00128 
00129                 default:
00130                     return QVariant();
00131             }
00132         else
00133             return QString("%1").arg(section);
00134     }
00135     else if (role == Qt::ToolTipRole)
00136     {
00137         if (orientation == Qt::Horizontal)
00138             switch (section)
00139             {
00140                 case translation_column:
00141                     return tr("Translation");
00142                 
00143                 case chapter_column:
00144                     return tr("Chapter");
00145 
00146                 case verse_column:
00147                     return tr("Verse");
00148 
00149                 default:
00150                     return QVariant();
00151             }
00152     }
00153 
00154     return QVariant();
00155  }

00157  boost::shared_ptr<VerseDisplay> SearchResultsModel::get_verse_display(const QModelIndex &index)
00158  {
00159      if (index.column() == text_column)
00160          return boost::shared_ptr<VerseDisplay>(new VerseDisplay(m_results->translation_at(index.row()), m_results->at(index.row()), 2));
00161      else
00162          return boost::shared_ptr<VerseDisplay>(new VerseDisplay(m_results->translation_at(index.row()), -1, -1));
00163  }
